front.title: Interworking between the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) and the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP): Multi-Party Text Chat

abstract.t: This document defines a bi-directional protocol mapping for theexchange of instant messages in the context of a many-to-many chatsession among users of the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) andusers of the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP).Specifically for SIP text chat, this document specifies a mapping tothe Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP).
